channel.title: Dance on Naresh Chaurasia

item.title: Ballroom Dancing - JJ
item.description: 10 Tips to Fred Astairedom The Beat of the Music Counting Music: Finding the Sets of 8 Downbeat and Upbeat Rythm Patterns Marking Rythms Counting Step Patterns 10 Tips to Fred Astairedom Understand the Music: Dance is a three-way partnership between you, your partner and the music. Know the music well. Take Lessons Focus on rhythm patterns, not direction of movement: A step pattern—those fancy-looking moves that define a dance— is the bigger motion a couple makes on the floor.
